General.Name: Argo Pantes Tbk
General.Description: PT Argo Pantes Tbk produces and sells various textile products primarily in Indonesia. The company is involved in the land, office, and warehouse rental activities. PT Argo Pantes Tbk was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Wisma Argo Manunggal, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12930
